movies.title: The Righteous Judge
movies.plot: Jesus had to struggle with authorities who saw His message as a threat. Caiaphas, the high Judge, tries to trick Jesus into making a judgment against the legal and moral authorities. Jesus responds with the great command: "Let he who is without sin, cast the first stone." On the street we see Aaron, a poor blind beggar. As two men pass him, one expresses the belief that Aaron's blindness is a punishment from God for his sins or the sins of his parents. Aaron is convinced in his heart and souls that Jesus can heal him, but he cannot find Him. His good parents set off to try to find Jesus. Caiaphas, the high judge of Israel, considers himself to be enormously wise - wiser than Solomon. He sentences a woman, who has been disloyal to her husband, to be stoned to death. News comes that Jesus has healed a man on the Sabbath even though, according to Jewish law, no work is to be done on the Sabbath. Caiaphas angrily sends men to arrest Jesus and they find Him teaching in the temple. He turns...

biography.bio: Gregory Snegoff was born on June 22, 1955 in Santa Monica, California, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Misery (1990), Wicked City (1987) and Glengarry Glen Ross (1992). He is married to Fiorella Capuano. He was previously married to Lisa Michelson.
biography.name: Gregory Snegoff

biography.bio: James Arrington was born on December 17, 1948 as James Wesley Arrington. He is an actor, known for The Swan Princess (1994), The Swan Princess: Escape from Castle Mountain (1997) and The Swan Princess Christmas (2012).
biography.name: James Arrington

biography.bio: Greg L. Steiner is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Greg L. Steiner

biography.bio: Bonnie B. Hobbs is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Bonnie B. Hobbs

biography.bio: Dion Luther is an actor and producer, known for The Beachcombers (1972), Follow the Bitch (1996) and Def Jam Vendetta (2003).
biography.name: Dion Luther

biography.bio: Ralph Rodgers is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Ralph Rodgers

biography.bio: Jonathan Hogan is an actor, known for Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Jonathan Hogan

biography.bio: Duane Hill is an actor and writer, known for The Executioner's Song (1982), The Bobroom (2004) and Side by Side: The True Story of the Osmond Family (1982).
biography.name: Duane Hill

biography.bio: Linda Bishop is known for her work on Big Eyes (2014), Will There Really Be a Morning? (1983) and Cagney & Lacey (1981).
biography.name: Linda Bishop

biography.bio: John Nicolaysen is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The Joseph Smith Story (1988) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: John Nicolaysen

biography.bio: Stephen Cracroft is an actor and assistant director, known for Savage Journey (1983), China O'Brien (1990) and Not in This Town (1997).
biography.name: Stephen Cracroft

biography.bio: John Runnels is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: John Runnels

biography.bio: Ivan Crosland was born on August 29, 1936. He was an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The ButterCream Gang (1992) and Brigham City (2001). He died on March 26, 2015 in Provo, Utah, USA.
biography.name: Ivan Crosland
